spells.html_content:
Spells

Temporal Paradox
/ Time Rift
0 Range / 3AP

On the caster's Accomplice or Xelor's Dial:
• Applies the Unmovable state.
• Teleports entities symmetrically in relation to them in a 4-cell circle around them.
• Sets the cooldown period of the caster's Accomplice and Xelor's Dial spells to 1 turn.
• At the start of the Accomplice's or Dial's turn, teleports these entities again.

Teleportation does not affect a Synchro and the caster.

The effects cannot be unbewitched.

Can generate a Telefrag.
Required level: :
55|122|189

Normal effects

'Unmovable' state (1 turn)
Symmetric teleportation
Fixes the cooldown period of Accomplice at 1 turn(s)
Fixes the cooldown period of Xelor's Dial at 1 turn(s)
Symmetric teleportation (1 turn)

Critical effects

No effect for this spell

Other characteristics

Recast interval
4
Modifiable range
No
Line of sight
No
Cast in a straight line only
No
Target necessary
Yes
Area of Effect
Circle of 4 cells

Teleportation does not affect a Synchro and the caster.

spells.html_content:
Spells

Synchro
/ Twenty-Fifth Hour
1 - 2 Range / 2AP

Summons a static Synchro that dies and inflicts Air damage on enemies in a 3-cell circle when it enters the Telefrag state. Damage does not decrease with distance.

It is healed and its final damage inflicted increases with each Telefrag generated by the caster.
This effect can only be triggered 1 time per turn and 1 time per spell.

The Synchro is immune to the Mummification and Embalming spells and cannot be activated with the Rewind spell.

There can only be one Synchro per team. If the Synchro is still on the field when summoned again, the old one is destroyed to make room for the new one.
Required level: :
60|127|194

Normal effects

Summons
Synchronisation

Critical effects

No effect for this spell

Other characteristics

Recast interval
3
Modifiable range
No
Line of sight
No
Cast in a straight line only
No
Target necessary
No

details.name: Synchro
details.description:
Summons a static Synchro that dies and inflicts Air damage on enemies in a 3-cell circle when it enters the Telefrag state. Damage does not decrease with distance.

It is healed and its final damage inflicted increases with each Telefrag generated by the caster.
This effect can only be triggered 1 time per turn and 1 time per spell.

The Synchro is immune to the Mummification and Embalming spells and cannot be activated with the Rewind spell.

There can only be one Synchro per team. If the Synchro is still on the field when summoned again, the old one is destroyed to make room for the new one.

/ Accomplice
1 - 4 Range / 3AP

Summons a Dial that removes AP from enemies in the Telefrag state and increase the AP of allies in the Telefrag state in an area of effect.
When it is summoned again, it reapplies the AP bonus to allies who already had it.

There can only be one Xelor's Dial per team. If the Dial is still on the field when summoned again, the old one is destroyed to make room for the new one.
